d3b07384-d9b1-4f2a-9b2a-1a2e4f6c8f01.title: Spaghetti Bolognese
d3b07384-d9b1-4f2a-9b2a-1a2e4f6c8f01.description1: Classic Italian pasta with a rich, slow-simmered beef and tomato sauce.

step1.title: Prepare ingredients
step1.description: Chop the onion and garlic, grate the carrot, and open the canned tomatoes.

step2.title: Sauté vegetables
step2.description: Heat olive oil in a large pan, add onion and garlic and cook until translucent. Add grated carrot and cook 2–3 minutes.

step3.title: Brown the beef
step3.description: Add ground beef and cook until browned, breaking it up with a spoon.

step4.title: Add tomatoes and simmer
step4.description: Stir in tomato paste, crushed tomatoes and red wine (if using). Season with salt and pepper. Reduce heat and simmer 30–35 minutes.

step5.title: Cook spaghetti
step5.description: Cook spaghetti in salted boiling water according to package instructions until al dente. Drain.

step6.title: Serve
step6.description: Combine sauce with spaghetti or spoon sauce over pasta. Garnish with fresh basil.

a1f5c2b7-6f9d-4c1b-8e2b-3b7a9e5c2d34.title: Chicken Stir-Fry with Vegetables
a1f5c2b7-6f9d-4c1b-8e2b-3b7a9e5c2d34.description1: Quick pan-stirred chicken with colorful vegetables and a savory sauce—perfect for weeknights.

step1.title: Make the sauce
step1.description: Whisk together soy sauce, oyster sauce, and sesame oil. Set aside.

step2.title: Prep and heat pan
step2.description: Heat vegetable oil in a wok or large skillet over high heat.

step3.title: Cook chicken
step3.description: Add chicken slices and stir-fry until cooked through, about 4–5 minutes. Remove and set aside.

step4.title: Stir-fry vegetables
step4.description: Add garlic and ginger, then add peppers and broccoli. Stir-fry 3–4 minutes until crisp-tender.

step5.title: Combine and finish
step5.description: Return chicken to the pan, add sauce, toss everything until coated and heated through. Serve over rice.

5c9fa8e2-2a11-4dbd-8b9e-7f6a3c4d5e67.title: Vegan Buddha Bowl
5c9fa8e2-2a11-4dbd-8b9e-7f6a3c4d5e67.description1: Nourishing bowl with quinoa, roasted chickpeas, roasted vegetables and a tahini lemon dressing.

step1.title: Cook quinoa
step1.description: Rinse quinoa and cook according to package instructions. Fluff and set aside.

step2.title: Roast chickpeas and veggies
step2.description: Toss chickpeas and sweet potato cubes with olive oil, smoked paprika, salt and pepper. Roast with zucchini at 200°C (400°F) for 20–25 minutes until tender and crisp.

step3.title: Make dressing
step3.description: Whisk 3 tbsp tahini with juice of half a lemon, a little water to thin, salt and pepper.

step4.title: Assemble bowl
step4.description: Layer quinoa, mixed greens, roasted vegetables, chickpeas and avocado. Drizzle with tahini dressing.

9e2b1c4a-7a6f-4b2c-8c3d-0f1a2b3c4d55.title: Fluffy Buttermilk Pancakes
9e2b1c4a-7a6f-4b2c-8c3d-0f1a2b3c4d55.description1: Light and tender pancakes made with buttermilk—great for weekend breakfasts.
ingredients: Vegetable oil or extra butter for cooking

step1.title: Mix dry ingredients
step1.description: In a bowl, whisk flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda and salt.

step2.title: Combine wet ingredients
step2.description: In another bowl, whisk buttermilk, eggs and melted butter until combined.

step3.title: Make batter
step3.description: Pour wet into dry and stir until just combined; small lumps are fine. Let rest 5 minutes.

step4.title: Cook pancakes
step4.description: Heat a nonstick pan over medium heat, grease lightly. Pour 1/4 cup batter per pancake. Cook until bubbles form, flip and cook until golden.

step5.title: Serve
step5.description: Serve warm with butter and maple syrup.

f4a7b8c9-1d2e-4f3a-9b0c-6a7d8e9f0b12.title: Pan-Seared Salmon with Lemon Asparagus
f4a7b8c9-1d2e-4f3a-9b0c-6a7d8e9f0b12.description1: Crispy-skinned salmon fillets served with quickly sautéed asparagus and a lemon butter sauce.

step1.title: Prepare salmon
step1.description: Pat salmon dry, season both sides with salt and pepper. Score skin lightly if needed.

step2.title: Sear salmon
step2.description: Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium-high heat. Place salmon skin-side down and cook 4–5 minutes until skin is crisp. Flip and cook 2–3 minutes until done to preference. Remove and keep warm.

step3.title: Cook asparagus
step3.description: In same pan, add butter and asparagus. Sauté 3–4 minutes until tender-crisp. Squeeze lemon over asparagus.

step4.title: Finish and serve
step4.description: Plate salmon with asparagus, spoon lemon-butter from the pan over fish, and garnish with parsley.

2b8e6d4f-3c1a-45b7-9a2f-8d7c6b5a4e33.title: Classic Greek Salad
2b8e6d4f-3c1a-45b7-9a2f-8d7c6b5a4e33.description1: Fresh, crunchy salad with tomatoes, cucumber, red onion, olives and feta — great as a side or light meal.

step1.title: Chop vegetables
step1.description: Prepare tomatoes, cucumber and red onion and place in a large bowl.

step2.title: Add feta and olives
step2.description: Add cubed feta and Kalamata olives to the bowl.

step3.title: Dress salad
step3.description: Whisk olive oil, red wine vinegar, oregano, salt and pepper. Pour over salad and toss gently.

step4.title: Serve
step4.description: Serve immediately as a side or with crusty bread for a light meal.
